sn22.123:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma ca sariputto ayasma ca mahakotthiko baranasiyam viharanti isipatane migadaye.
sn22.123:1.2: Atha kho ayasma mahakotthiko sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yenayasma sariputto tenupasankami; upasankamitva …pe… etadavoca:
sn22.123:2.1: “Sutavatavuso sariputta, bhikkhuna katame dhamma yoniso manasi katabba”ti?
sn22.123:2.2: “Sutavatavuso kotthika, bhikkhuna pancupadanakkhandha aniccato …pe… anattato yoniso manasi katabba.
sn22.123:2.5: Sutavatavuso kotthika, bhikkhuna ime pancupadanakkhandha aniccato …pe… anattato yoniso manasi katabba.
sn22.123:2.6: Thanam kho panetam, avuso, vijjati—yam sutava bhikkhu ime pancupadanakkhandhe aniccato …pe… anattato yoniso manasi karonto sotapattiphalam sacchikareyya”ti.
sn22.123:3.1: “Sotapannena panavuso sariputta, bhikkhuna katame dhamma yoniso manasi katabba”ti?
sn22.123:3.2: “Sotapannenapi kho avuso kotthika, bhikkhuna ime pancupadanakkhandha aniccato …pe… anattato yoniso manasi katabba.
sn22.123:3.3: Thanam kho panetam, avuso, vijjati—yam sotapanno bhikkhu ime pancupadanakkhandhe aniccato …pe… anattato yoniso manasi karonto sakadagamiphalam …pe…
sn22.123:4.1: “Arahata panavuso sariputta, katame dhamma yoniso manasi katabba”ti?
sn22.123:4.2: “Arahatapi khvavuso kotthika, ime pancupadanakkhandha aniccato dukkhato rogato gandato sallato aghato abadhato parato palokato sunnato anattato yoniso manasi katabba.
sn22.123:4.3: Natthi, khvavuso, arahato uttari karaniyam, katassa va paticayo;
sn22.123:4.4: api ca kho ime dhamma bhavita bahulikata ditthadhammasukhaviharaya ceva samvattanti satisampajannaya ca”ti.
